Gallery.Name: Posts
Gallery.Description: Explore works posted by users and get inspired. Click on a work to view details, share, or download it.

Gallery.Name: My Works
Gallery.Description: View, manage, edit, and delete the works you have created.

Generator.Name: Character
Generator.Description: Enter a prompt to generate a character image.

Generator.Name: Characters in Bulk
Generator.Tooltip: Create multiple characters at once based on predefined parameters
Generator.Description:
Select predefined parameters to generate multiple characters at once.
These are fixed settings applied to image generation.
To adjust the fixed settings, generate an image first, then use the "Regenerate" feature to retrieve and modify the prompt.

Fixed Settings:
- Shot Type: Full-body shot
- View Type: Front-facing
- Background: Simple (White to Gray)
- Aspect Ratio & Resolution: 3:4 (864 × 1152px)

Generator.Name: Character Pose
Generator.Tooltip: Create different set of poses with a single character
Generator.Description:
Enter a single character prompt to generate images in four different poses.
These are fixed settings applied to image generation.
To adjust the fixed settings, generate an image first, then use the "Regenerate"feature to retrieve and modify the prompt.

Fixed Settings:
- Shot Type: Full-body shot
- Background: Simple (White to Gray)
- Aspect Ratio & Resolution: Fixed per pose

Generator.Name: Background
Generator.Description: Enter a prompt to generate a background image.

Generator.Name: UI
Generator.Description: Enter a prompt to generate game UI elements.

Generator.Name: Effect
Generator.Description: Enter a prompt to generate special effect images.

Editor.Name: Facial Expression
Editor.Tooltip: Detect and modify facial expressions with AI
Editor.Description:
Automatically detects the face and changes the facial expression based on your selection.
The expression changes more effectively by following these conditions:
- The image contains only one face.
- The face is clearly distinguishable from the background.
- Enough non-face areas should be included for reference.
- The Input Image size is recommended to be at least 1024 × 1024px.

Editor.Name: Inpainting
Editor.Description: Select an area to modify and enter a prompt to edit the image. The Input Image size is recommended to be at least 1024 × 1024px.

Editor.Name: Background Remove
Editor.Description: Automatically remove the background from an image.

Editor.Name: Enhance
Editor.Tooltip: Increase resolution and refine details automatically
Editor.Description: Increase resolution and enhance details automatically. Adjust the enhancement strength to achieve the desired level of image refinement. The Input Image size is recommended to be at least 1024 × 1024px.

Extender.Name: Outpainting
Extender.Tooltip: Extend the image beyond the original dimensions
Extender.Description: Seamlessly expand the boundary of an image to create new areas. The Input Image size is recommended to be at least 1024 × 1024px.

Extender.Name: Background Loop
Extender.Tooltip: Seamlessly expand the image vertically or horizontally
Extender.Description: Extend backgrounds seamlessly to create infinitely repeating horizontal loops.

3D.Name: Depth Mesh Converter
3D.Tooltip: Convert 2D images to depth maps and 3d meshes
3D.Description: Convert 2D images into depth maps and 3D meshes.

3D.Name: Text2Motion
3D.Description: Generate animations based on text descriptions. The final Output will be saved as an .anim (Humanoid) file.
